text_block_list.text: Can you believe in that which you<n>cannot see?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
Hehe... You're incredibly fast, without<n>a doubt... I'm going to
have to do<n>better than this...
That which is only beheld in the eyes<n>of another?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: ...So that I can catch up... to my friend...
Who exactly are you?

It's well past dusk when I realize<n>I've forgotten my phone
somewhere.

I probably set it down while focusing<n>on watching some
training sessions<n>around the academy today.

I jog back to where I assume I've<n>left the thing, and am
reassuringly<n>greeted by a flashing low-battery<n>light.
Hehe...
—s is fun... hehe... —ow can I... —atch<n>up?

I don't expect to hear anything on the<n>track at this hour, let
alone laughter. Is<n>someone really out here training right<n>
now?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Phew... Don't worry... I can keep<n>going.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: ...That's right. However many more<n>times it takes...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: ...I really love... running with you...
choice_data_list: (Just, uh... who is she talking to?)

text_block_list.text:
There's certainly no one around<n>besides us. I know that
it's quite dark<n>out, but still. Thinking it strange, I<n>approach
the lone student, when...
Thwack!

It feels as if something has rammed<n>into my shoulder. I
can't see anything<n>in the vicinity, however.

But a girl talking to someone who<n>isn't there? And then
myself colliding<n>with some kind of invisible force?

The night air isn't the only thing<n>giving me the chills...
Though it's<n>probably just my imagination running<n>wild...

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Are you for real? I'll gladly take up<n>the offer! It's always
been my dream<n>to make it big in a G1 race!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text: For real. Let's turn that dream into<n>reality!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
O-okay! I've been aiming to debut in<n>the Twinkle Series this
whole time,<n>so...

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
I sense you've got what it takes. I'll<n>be back to watch your
tryout race.<n>Think you can show me everything<n>you've
got?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
choice_data_list: Oh, right. The girl from last night...

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Hey, <username>! Looks like you've<n>got your eyes on
someone.

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Oh, the girl over there? ...She does run<n>with mighty fine form.
Are you gonna<n>scout her?
choice_data_list: Well, I'm not so sure just yet...

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Really? I've definitely seen her<n>somewhere, though... Um,
maybe in<n>these pamphlets, yeah?

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Found her—Manhattan Cafe. She's<n>good. If you're not
going to scout her,<n>then I'm off to chat to her.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: You want... to scout me?

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! If you don't have anyone else<n>in mind, why don't we
aim for the top<n>of the Twinkle Series together?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: The Twinkle Series...

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text: You can outrun anyone else out here<n>for sure!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: ...Anyone else? Hm... Do you think... Icould even outrun... her?

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text: ..."Her"? Who? Oh, I'm guessing you<n>have a rival then?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
...Yes. She's incredibly fast... That girl<n>standing right over
there...

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text: O-over there? But there's no one th—

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
She looks like me... She's the one<n>who led me here. My
dear friend...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
She hasn't changed since we were<n>children... Always
running ahead of<n>me... I dream of... reaching her...

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Huh...

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Sigh... Save your breath. Don'tthink she's looking to really talk toanyone, let alone be scouted.

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
I couldn't make heads or tails of<n>anything she was babbling
about... It<n>was like she was trying to drive me<n>off. And
honestly, the things she was<n>saying were kind of, uh...

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Kind of creepy?

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
I'm just saying that maybe you<n>shouldn't bother. She
seems to be<n>more trouble than anything...
I'm reminded of what happened last<n>night.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: ...That's right. However many more<n>times it takes...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: ...I really love... running with you...

I chalk up all that happened last night<n>to my imagination, but
perhaps there is<n>something more at play here.
Does she really not have any interest<n>in being scouted?

My mind drifts, pondering the<n>mysterious Manhattan Cafe.
Next<n>thing I know, the sky has darkened<n>into a murky
night...
